meta.title: Go Game Studio | Weiqi Apps

hero.title: Go · Art · Technology
hero.subtitle: A decade of dedication to creating the finest Go app ecosystem

apps.sectionSubtitle: Each one crafted with passion, just to bring you the best Go experience

xgoo.name: XGoo
xgoo.descIos: Powerful Go platform for playing and learning, with AI matches, game records, and life & death problems
xgoo.descMac: The best Go app on Mac, with large screen experience and professional analysis

joseki.name: Joseki Dictionary
joseki.descMac: Extensive joseki variations, an essential reference for Go learners
joseki.descIos: Portable joseki encyclopedia, learn joseki anytime, anywhere

gonote.name: Go Note
gonote.desc: Record every game you play, review and analyze, keep improving

lifedeath.name: Life & Death Dictionary
lifedeath.desc: Comprehensive tsumego collection, from beginner to advanced, enhance your reading

peakgo.name: Peak Go
peakgo.desc: Appreciate classic master games, experience the thrill of legendary matches

renjunote.name: Renju Note
renjunote.desc: Gomoku/Renju recording and study tool, essential for enthusiasts

item1.title: Website Auto-Deployment Live
item1.desc: Successfully integrated GitHub Actions, Daniel now handles all deployments.

item2.title: Daily Tsumego Challenge
item2.desc: Introducing interactive WGo board. Under Asi's supervision. Optimizing mobile layout.

item3.title: iTyping Deep Optimization
item3.desc: Planning to add typing trajectory analysis and targeted weakness training.

tsumego.sectionSubtitle: Synced from XGoo App's live problem database, improve your reading every day

about.title: About Us
about.p1: We are a group of developers passionate about Go, dedicated to perfectly blending traditional Go culture with modern technology.
about.p2: Since 2012, we have developed 8 Go-related apps, serving hundreds of thousands of Go enthusiasts worldwide.
about.p3: Here you'll find not only rigorous algorithms, but also warm companionship: our Chief Officer Asi — a bright yellow budgie, is supervising every line of code.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Questions or suggestions? Feel free to reach out
